Media partners
BECOME OUR INFO-PARTNER
Exhibition team is open to cooperation with specific printed and online media and events with similar topics.
Terms of cooperation are discussed individually with each partner. If you want to support the exhibition, please send your proposal to the exhibition brand-manager Yana Frolova y.frolova@rusfishexpo.com
REFERENCE POLICY
Any information from this website can be copied with the reference to the source only. Any changes, adding extra information or misrepresentation are prohibited. Learn more about quoting rules in Russian Federal Law N 149 from 27.07.2006 clause 3 article 7 (reduction from 18.03.2019).
